ocr_full_text_page: needs as well as safe and secure transportation for females 1 from education institutions to their homes, which makes parents reluctant to support girls education Fifthly, there is massive digital divide to which the greatest affectees are women. Globally the digital divide is 60% out of which girls/females are 51% In Pakistan, situation is even worse. The to digital divide is 58% whereas for girls it is 24% This shows that more than half of the girls population in Pakistan does not even have access turainternet HA which shuts the door of online learning world on them completely. Sixthly females lack the required security outside of their homes.
